title: Life and Youth - perspective of speaker

content.question: Lines 36-40 (“I take . . . doubt”) develop the speaker’s perspective mainly by

choices.label: underscoring the speaker’s nostalgia for childish pursuits
illustrating the speaker’s commitment to a generational change
showing the speaker’s aptitude for public leadership
highlighting the speaker’s awareness of social inequalities

content.answer: illustrating the speaker’s commitment to a generational change

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe the narrator or speaker of a text.
